title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: This week AdLunam team has onboarded Andrea Reade , a famous NFT artist and Community Leader/Moderator for Joyn.xyz to discuss NFTs, Exhibitions, Multimedium, Sculpture, Web 3 and more!Join us today on Twitter Spaces at 2 PM CET: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1djxXlkAmbvxZ

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: Since Bitcoin’s emergence in 2009, the crypto world has witnessed several successive revolutions at a rapid pace with the launch of smart contracts, decentralized finance (DeFi), decentralized applications (DApp), and other features.In turn, many early-stage cryptocurrency projects have turned to the latest fundraising platforms to secure funds. A crypto launchpad, also known as an Initial DEX Offering (IDO) has emerged as the successor of earlier platforms such as Initial Coin Offerings (ICO) and Initial Exchange Offerings (IEO).One such launchpad is AdLunam, one of the industry’s first NFT-integrated Engage to Earn seed crowdfunding and IDO launchpad using a Proof of Attention model to source the best projects for early stage investors.Learn more: https://adlunam.cc
